content: I am a software developer who lives in Istanbul,
graduated from Istanbul Technical University Computer Engineering Department,
loves using Python to develop automation solutions,
prefers to use GNU/Linux systems and believes in the idea of free software,
loves playing darbuka, taking photographs, and writing with fountain pens,
does not want to work for military/destructive technologies, and
likes to work on tools that help people more than making bosses richer(ideally).
